name: ashjoory/radicle-valet-driver
description: Custom Valet driver for Bedrock/Radicle setup

post-install-cmd: @php -r "if (file_exists('vendor/ashjoory/radicle-valet-driver/src/LocalValetDriver.php')) { copy('vendor/ashjoory/radicle-valet-driver/src/LocalValetDriver.php', 'LocalValetDriver.php'); echo 'LocalValetDriver.php copied successfully.\n'; if (!file_exists('.gitignore') || !preg_match('/^LocalValetDriver\.php$/m', file_get_contents('.gitignore'))) file_put_contents('.gitignore', "\nLocalValetDriver.php", FILE_APPEND); }"
post-update-cmd: @php -r "if (file_exists('vendor/ashjoory/radicle-valet-driver/src/LocalValetDriver.php')) { copy('vendor/ashjoory/radicle-valet-driver/src/LocalValetDriver.php', 'LocalValetDriver.php'); echo 'LocalValetDriver.php copied successfully.\n'; if (!file_exists('.gitignore') || !preg_match('/^LocalValetDriver\.php$/m', file_get_contents('.gitignore'))) file_put_contents('.gitignore', "\nLocalValetDriver.php", FILE_APPEND); }"
post-remove-cmd:
@php -r "if (file_exists('LocalValetDriver.php')) { unlink('LocalValetDriver.php'); echo 'LocalValetDriver.php deleted successfully.
'; } if (file_exists('.gitignore')) { $gi = file('.gitignore', FILE_IGNORE_NEW_LINES); $gi = array_filter($gi, fn($line) => trim($line) !== 'LocalValetDriver.php'); file_put_contents('.gitignore', implode("
", $gi) . "
"); }"
